timeline.bodyText: Perhaps a better message would be 'online(N) not in [0,1]'?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.message:
Improve ProcessorUsage exception messages again

Signed-off-by: Peter Shipton <Peter_Shipton@ca.ibm.com>
